name: The Healthy Skin Edit Bestsellers Kit
about: What it is:A kit of skincare products for hydrated, visibly firmer, plumper-, brighter-looking skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C and Pomegranate Stem Cells: Visibly brighten and even the appearance of skin tone..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This kit features everything you need to get a healthy-, bright-looking, glowing complexion. iNNBEAUTY PROJECT‚Äôs formulas are jam-packed with clinically shown actives that will visibly transform your skin..This Set Contains:- 1.18 oz/ 35 mL SLUSHY Serum Moisturizer Crush.Clinical Results:
ingredients: -Vitamin C and Pomegranate Stem Cells: Visibly brighten and even the appearance of skin tone..-Bakuchiol and Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly firm, smooth, hydrate, and clarify skin..-Peptides and Ceramides: Visibly firm and plump skin while reducing the look of wrinkles...KEEP IT CLEAN Hydrating Gel Cleanser:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Ceramide NP, Glucosyl Ceramide, Arginine, Proline, Serine, Alanine, Glycine, Lysine HCl, Threonine, Collagen, Centella Asiatica Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Betaine, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Alpha-Glucan, Sodium PCA, PCA, Pullulan, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sucrose Stearate, Glutamic Acid, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Citric Acid, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Phytate...GREEN MACHINE Vitamin C Serum:.Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil/Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Isosorbide Dicaprylate, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Oil, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, XanthanGum, Crithmum Maritimum Callus Culture Filtrate, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Extract, Collagen Amino Acids, Potassium Azeloyl Diglycinate, Brassica Oleracea Acephala (Kale) Leaf Extract, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum (Holy Basil) Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Origanum Vulgare (Oregano) Oil, Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Leaf Extract, Pinus Pinaster (Pine) Bark Extract, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Maltodextrin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Amber Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopherol...SLUSHY Serum Moisturizer Crush:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated vegetable oil, Stearic acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Bakuchiol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Junos (Yuzu) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Boerhavia Diffusa Root Extract, Pinus Pinaster Bark Extract, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Betaine, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Carbomer, Propanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Dextrin, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol, Sorbitol, Phosphatidylcholine, Docosahexaenoic Acid, Eicosapentaenoic Acid, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Citrus Junos (Yuzu) peel, Sodium phytate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Phytosphingosine, Monascus Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Titanium Dioxide, Ethylhexylglycerin...10+10 MORE-STURIZER:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Arachidyl Alcohol, Squalane, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, , Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Ceramide NP, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Linoleic Acid, Citric Acid, Phytosterols, Glucose, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Behenyl Alcohol, Polyisobutene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Arachidyl Glucoside, Carrageenan, Sorbitan Laurate, Sodium Phytate, , C18-36 Acid Glycol Ester, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride.     ....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.KEEP IT CLEAN Hydrating Gel Cleanser.-To remove makeup, apply three to four pumps onto dry face using dry hands. .-Massage into face, concentrating on areas with hard-to-remove makeup. .-Add water and continue to massage off as you rinse with warm water..-For regular cleansing, apply to wet skin, massage thoroughly, and rinse with warm water...GREEN MACHINE Vitamin C Serum.-Apply to clean skin after you cleanse and tone. Gently massage into face and neck. ..SLUSHY Serum Moisturizer Crush.-Apply to skin after you cleanse and tone. Can be used as hydrating serum step or as moisturizer step depending on skin's needs...10+10 MORE-STURIZER.-Apply to face and neck after cleansing, toning, and applying your serum step AM and PM. -Can be layered on top of GREEN MACHINE or SLUSHY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love these four products usually but when one is defective( won‚Äôt pump) it makes for a disappointed customer.

reviews.review_title: the serum being brownish is normal!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this set, my skin has noticeably cleared up. The only thing that I personally havent really used is the moisturizer since the one Im currently using is perfect for my skin but everything else is super great. Ive seen lots of reviews talking about the green serums brownish color and I just wanted to say that i've bought the full size of it before and it was like that. Since its a clean brand the color isn't going to be and/or stay a bright green color. I highly recommend this set as someone with acne prone combination skin, its worth it.
Feels great at first but after a few days of using, this combination of products seems to really dry out my skin and break me out a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Upon receiving my kit I was pleasantly surprised by the packaging and the size of the products. All of the pumps worked well and the product dispensed nicely. On my first use I did notice that there was a brown hue to the Green Machine serum. I read others had experienced this as well but personally wasnt satisfied with my purchase so contacted Sephora for a return. However, my second Green Machine was the same color. I then contacted InBeauty and they assured me that the color change was solely due to the natural ingridients that the product is made with and it is safe to use and assured me I will still see the same results.   Overall I am happy with my purchase. Nice packaging, good size and I believe the amount of product needed per use it minimal so this should last sometime. What I am unhappy about it the color of the product and the extent of work I had to go to in order to find out if this was normal. I would kindly suggest that a note be made in the description or packagaing that oxidiaztion can occur.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it was pretty good but the green machine one was brown. it was like a bronzer, is that normal? and it burned when i put it on, but the rest was good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second time I‚Äôve purchased this kit! It‚Äôs a great deal for sure. I love slushy as a lightweight moisturizer for the warmer months. It‚Äôs smoothing and reallt makes my skin juicy, so I also use it as a serum in the winter.  I was SO surprised by how much I love the 10+10 moisturizer. It‚Äôs my favorite to travel with and looks great under makeup and mineral spf. I‚Äôm quite sensitive to vitamin c and can‚Äôt use a lot of formulas because of it, but this doesn‚Äôt irritate my skin at all. It‚Äôs great to get vitamin c and peptides and my moisturizer in one go.  I don‚Äôt love the cleanser as I find it drying but it works for travel. Green machine doesn‚Äôt irritate my skin at all either and is a great antioxidant serum.  The stars here are the moisturizers tho so a great deal.  I have acne prone and combo-oily skin. I do prioritize anti-aging as well.

J‚Äôutilise ces produit depuis un mois et j‚Äôadore le nettoyant le s√©rum et la cr√®me. Mais l‚Äôhydratant beaucoup moins. Il ne se m√©lange pas avec d‚Äôautres produit pourtant c‚Äôest d√©j√† m√™me marque . J‚Äôavais des grumeaux sur mon visages j‚Äôai essayer √ßa trois fois m√™me r√©sultant mais sans c‚Äôest parfait ! Mais sinon 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of this company but someone in Sephora educated me. Long story short I love all the products in this kit! However I do have my favs! The Keep It Clean Cleanser, Green Machine and the moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am so upset this isn‚Äôt working for me. I typically adapt really well to new skincare products. However, I noticed an instant change of blemishes popping up all over my skin. Very sad about this.

reviews.review_title: SLUSHY & KeeP iT CLEAN are A1!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved getting this to try everything before I committed to the regular sized products!! I am a believer of the keep it clean!!! I did like the green machine and the MOREsturizer was very hydrating. Great if you‚Äôre trying to repair your skin barrier IMO. My fav is the slushy, however.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tagged price on this item is $48, but Sephora is selling it for $49. This is illegal according to the Quebec Consumer Protection Act.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The green machine serum no matter how much i pumped out was brown and was expired. Everything else was fine was looking forward to the mini serum he most though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The vitamin C that comes in the with was expired the color looks like dark brown I‚Äôd had to return this kit

reviews.review_title: cheap packaging. Not luxury skincare quality
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Back packaging - the pump for the bakuchiol serum doesn‚Äôt work so I can‚Äôt access the product. You can‚Äôt twist off the lid or anything so kind of a waste. Will have to saw off the entire top to be able to use the product!  product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I used it before going to bed and it felt refreshing and relaxing and I did as the instructions said and did every step on the box and the next day woke up and my face was burning burning‚Äôs and inch

reviews.review_title: Not for Sensitive Skin. Highly not Recommended.
reviews.review_text: I had a horrible skin reaction with the use of these products. I was recommended these products by a Sephora Worker and I was told it‚Äôs great for sensitive skin. Im not sure if the Green Monster was supposed to be green but it looks almost brownish-green like. Additionally, I‚Äôm unsure of which product exactly caused my skin to turn red, swollen, flaky, and itchy. BUT, by the looks of the comments both the Slushy Cleanser and the Green Monster products seem to caused these symptoms to various women. Till this day I‚Äôm not sure what caused it. Thankfully my skin is resilient and recovered to its normal state after 2.5weeks. I returned all items to receive in-store credit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The green serum that came in my kit is bad. I think it‚Äôs expired or was exposed to extreme heat or something. It does not look like the product pictured at all, and it smells terrible. It‚Äôs a dark, yellowish green color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: also received an expired green machine, sephora does not believe these are expired. have reached out to innbeauty to do an inquiry on the batch. Sephora also isn't accepting that they have misrepresented the product being provided. Not at all happy with the customer service or lack thereof..
